mapper.select: SELECT post_id, user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at FROM posts ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO posts (user_id, title, content, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, NOW(), NOW());
mapper.update: UPDATE posts SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE post_id = #{postId};
